The Virtual MiniServer (VMS) platform is a technology that allows one single powerful server to host several Virtual Environment (VE) servers, each of them acting like its own dedicated server, but at a lower cost than a fully dedicated machine.

You can easily host dozens or hundreds of your clients in a VE and it will look just like your own dedicated server to your clients. It is an ideal solution for an expanding hosting company, at a fraction of a dedicated server's cost.

Our VMS machines are based on powerful Dual Xeon 2.0 Ghz processors and 2GB RAM. You are assigned minimum guaranteed resources. CPU/RAM means that this is the minimum CPU/RAM resources you can use; when you need them, nobody else can use them but you and your clients. If more resources are idle, you may use more than your allocation, up to the full 4Ghz total (dual 2Ghz).


Included FREE: CPanel ($99 value!)
